translation.en: [Morgan Freeman] In the lives of every creature on Earth…
…are echoes…
…of events that occurred a long, long time ago.
Events of unimaginable scale…
and violent beauty…
that connect all living things…
…their every action and decision,
their every heartbeat,
to the grandest story ever told.
translation.ko: 이제껏 전해진 가장 장엄한 이야기에 연결합니다

translation.en: This is a tale 13.8 billion years in the making…
that has seen billions of stars
and billions of worlds…
live and die…
to create the only planet we know of
translation.ko: 우리가 아는 유일한 행성을 만들어낸 이야기입니다

translation.en: that is home to life.
From the stardust that built us…
to the cosmic ingredients that sustain us…
and the starlight that powers it all,
translation.ko: 그 모든 것에 동력을 공급하는 별빛에 이르기까지

translation.en: this is the story of our universe.
East Africa.
It's where life's most vital connection to the universe can be found.
translation.ko: 생명과 우주의 가장 필수적인 연결이 발견되는 곳이죠

translation.en: And a very special predator…
named Wa Chini.
Life for a cheetah is a never-ending search for food…
for vital energy.
And this is one of the hardest places on Earth for a predator to obtain it.
translation.ko: 이곳은 지구상에서 포식자가 생체 에너지를 얻기 힘든 곳으로 손꼽히기도 합니다

translation.en: The blistering sun has driven away nearly everything
translation.ko: 맹렬하게 타오르는 태양이 이 건조하고 황량한 평원에서

translation.en: from these dry, desolate plains.
Any creature that remains here struggles to survive.
translation.ko: 이곳에 남은 생물은 모두 살아남기 위해 고군분투합니다

translation.en: Wa Chini's sole focus…
…the only thing driving her…
…is hunger.
This simple, primal impulse
stems from a deep connection she has to her surroundings
translation.ko: 와치니가 주변 환경과 맺고 있는 깊은 관계에서 비롯합니다

translation.en: that extends beyond the Serengeti,
beyond our planet
to the universe itself.
translation.ko: 우주 그 자체와 맺은 관계 말입니다

translation.en: Every cell in Wa Chini's body…
is linked to an ancient stream of energy…
…connecting her life to the heart of a star.
This unbroken stream spans vast reaches of space…
translation.ko: 이 중단된 적 없는 흐름은 광대한 우주 공간에 걸쳐 있고…

translation.en: and stretches back 13.8 billion years.
Ancient energy that existed at the origin of our universe
translation.ko: 우리 우주의 기원부터 존재했던 고대의 에너지가

translation.en: powers everything.
Every planet.
Every star.
Every life.
Wa Chini is hunting for energy…
but not just for herself.
A mother of two five-month-old cubs,
she's desperate to feed her hungry family.
translation.ko: 와치니는 필사적으로 배고픈 가족을 먹이려 합니다

translation.en: It's dry season, and food is scarce.
And yet, energy is more abundant than ever.
translation.ko: 하지만 에너지는 그 어느 때보다 풍부합니다

translation.en: It's just hiding in plain sight.
translation.ko: 뻔히 눈앞에 있어도 못 볼 뿐이죠

translation.en: The largest, brightest, hottest object in our solar system…
translation.ko: 바로 우리 태양계에서 가장 크고 밝고 뜨거운 물체…

translation.en: the sun.
Huge loops of searingly hot plasma erupt from its surface.
translation.ko: 거대한 플라스마 고리가 이글거리며 표면에서 분출합니다

translation.en: Our sun blasts out the energy of four and a half trillion atomic bombs
translation.ko: 우리 태양은 1초마다 원자 폭탄 4조 5천억 개만큼의 에너지를

translation.en: every second…
sending more power to our planet in an hour
translation.ko: 전 세계가 1년 동안 쓰는 것보다 더 많은 에너지를

translation.en: than the entire world consumes in a year.
translation.ko: 한 시간 안에 우리 행성으로 보내죠

translation.en: But as impressive as this gigantic fireball is…
translation.ko: 하지만 이 거대한 불덩이가 아무리 인상적이라 해도…

translation.en: Wa Chini cannot eat sunlight.
She only eats things that run…
like gazelle.
Her spotted coat provides camouflage, essential for stalking prey.
translation.ko: 점박이 털은 먹잇감을 쫓는 데 필수적인 위장이 되어줍니다

translation.en: With few places to hide, getting closer isn't an option.
translation.ko: 숨을 곳이 거의 없어서 더 가까이 다가갈 수는 없습니다

translation.en: Luckily, Wa Chini has a trick up her sleeve.
Cheetah are the fastest animals on land.
From zero to a hundred in just three seconds…
but gazelles are a pretty close second.
translation.ko: 하지만 가젤의 속도도 그에 버금갈 정도입니다

translation.en: Wa Chini uses up a lot of energy…
but gains nothing.
An adult cheetah can survive for over a week without a meal.
translation.ko: 다 자란 치타는 먹지 않고도 일주일 이상 살 수 있습니다

translation.en: But cubs, they can go no longer than a few days.
translation.ko: 하지만 새끼들은 며칠 이상 버티지 못합니다

translation.en: And these two are getting very, very hungry.
translation.ko: 이 두 녀석은 무척이나 배가 고파지고 있고요

translation.en: Hunting at such great speeds is incredibly depleting.
translation.ko: 이렇게 대단한 속도로 사냥하면 엄청나게 에너지가 소진됩니다

translation.en: Wa Chini's energy reserves are now dangerously low.
translation.ko: 와치니의 에너지 비축량이 위험할 정도로 낮아졌습니다

translation.en: It will be hours before she has the strength to hunt again.
translation.ko: 다시 사냥할 힘을 모으려면 몇 시간은 걸릴 것입니다

translation.en: Wa Chini and her cubs are running on empty.
Animals all over the planet fight the same ongoing battle
translation.ko: 지구상 모든 동물이 똑같은 전투를 벌이며 살아갑니다

translation.en: between consuming…
and using energy.
No matter your strategy,
be it fast or slow,
your next meal is never guaranteed.
Hunger is something all of us must overcome.
translation.ko: 굶주림은 우리 모두가 극복해야 할 문제입니다

translation.en: Having recovered from her last chase,
Wa Chini is looking for her next opportunity.
Like all cheetah mothers,
she's parenting solo.
To keep her young cubs well-fed,
she should make a kill every day.
But it's taken her so long to recover
translation.ko: 하지만 회복하는 시간이 너무 오래 걸린 나머지

translation.en: that the sun is now setting.
As the light fades,
so does this family's hopes of a meal.
translation.ko: 이 가족이 식사를 할 희망도 사라집니다

translation.en: As Earth rotates…
the Serengeti turns away from the sun and into darkness.
translation.ko: 세렝게티는 태양을 등지고 어둠 속으로 들어갑니다

translation.en: It's a powerful reminder of life's connection to the sun.
translation.ko: 이는 생명과 태양의 관계를 강하게 상기해 줍니다

translation.en: Our story is the sun's story.
Long, long ago…
…our solar system was even colder and darker than it is today.
translation.ko: 우리 태양계는 지금보다 훨씬 춥고 어두웠습니다

translation.en: And yet, these were the perfect conditions for the birth of a star.
At temperatures close to absolute zero,
the force of gravity began pulling dust and gas together…
translation.ko: 중력의 힘이 먼지와 가스를 함께 끌어당기기 시작해…

translation.en: …into a massive cloud.
The cloud collapsed inwards,
crushing itself into a glowing hot ball of gas.
A protostar.
Like Wa Chini, this star in the making had a ferocious hunger…
translation.ko: 형성 중인 이 별도 와치니처럼 격하게 허기가 졌습니다

translation.en: pulling in so much gas that jets of hot matter
translation.ko: 엄청난 양의 가스를 끌어당기니 별의 양극으로부터

translation.en: were propelled from its poles,
stretching out light years into space.
translation.ko: 빛이 아주 오래도록 우주로 뻗어 나갑니다

translation.en: The infant star continued to grow for 30 million years…
translation.ko: 어린 별은 3천만 년 동안 계속 성장했습니다

translation.en: …until finally,
it became hot enough to generate power all on its own.
Our sun.
Its golden rays have now shone brilliantly and steadily…
translation.ko: 황금빛 광선은 이제 눈부시고 꾸준하게 빛납니다

translation.en: for 4.6 billion years.
It's just one star in a galaxy of billions.
translation.ko: 수십억 개 별이 모인 은하계에서 태양은 별 하나일 뿐입니다

translation.en: And yet, it is a most special one…
because it is the one that delivers heat and light…
to this incredible, vibrant planet.
Every living thing in the Serengeti depends on the sun for its energy.
translation.ko: 세렝게티의 모든 생명체는 태양에 의존해 에너지를 얻습니다

translation.en: Wa Chini's cubs are drained, beyond hungry now.
translation.ko: 와치니의 새끼들은 이제 배고프다 못해 녹초가 됐습니다

translation.en: They need to eat today.
But all Wa Chini can provide this morning is precious TLC.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침 와치니가 줄 수 있는 건 애정 어린 보살핌뿐입니다

translation.en: In this parched land,
our sun both gives and takes.
Its fierce energy is what life needs.
translation.ko: 태양의 강렬한 에너지는 생명체가 필요로 하는 것이지만

translation.en: But it also has the power to destroy.
It was never going to be easy living this close to a giant nuclear reactor.
translation.ko: 거대한 원자로에 이처럼 가까이 사는 게 결코 쉬웠을 리 없죠

translation.en: To understand the source of this unbearable heat,
translation.ko: 이 견딜 수 없는 열기의 근원을 이해하려면

translation.en: we must peer into the inferno…
…beneath the outer layers of bubbling hot plasma…
650 thousand kilometers down…
to the core of our sun.
Our star's heart would seem surprisingly calm…
translation.ko: 우리 별의 심장은 놀라우리만큼 고요해 보일 겁니다

translation.en: but on an atomic level, it's pure chaos.
This is the hottest part of our solar system.
Temperatures here reach 15 million degrees Celsius…
creating the conditions for an event that can happen almost nowhere else.
translation.ko: 다른 데서는 거의 일어날 수 없는 사건을 위한 조건을 만듭니다

translation.en: Atoms collide at high speed and fuse…
…releasing pure energy.
This process is called nuclear fusion
and is what makes our sun shine.
In fact, it's what powers all the stars in our universe.
translation.ko: 사실 우리 우주의 모든 별에 동력을 공급하는 것이기도 하죠

translation.en: This energy released by stars can be traced back to the beginning of time…
translation.ko: 별들이 발산하는 이 에너지는 태초까지 거슬러 갈 수 있습니다

translation.en: when there was no matter,
and all that existed in the entire universe was energy.
translation.ko: 우주 전체에 존재하는 것이라고는 에너지밖에 없었던 때죠

translation.en: And every bit of it lives on in our universe today.
translation.ko: 그리고 그 에너지의 모든 조각이 오늘날 우리 우주에 살아있습니다

translation.en: As sunlight hits the Serengeti,
energy that's been flowing for 13.8 billion years
finds its way to Wa Chini and her cubs
and continues its journey through their environment.
translation.ko: 그 녀석들이 사는 환경을 따라 여정을 이어 갑니다

translation.en: It is never created or destroyed.
It is simply transformed endlessly.
But Wa Chini and her Cubs can only access this energy in one form…
translation.ko: 하지만 와치니와 새끼들이 이 에너지에 접근하는 건 한 가지 형태로만 가능합니다

translation.en: meat.
And there are rival predators out here…
who could snatch not just her food but her cubs as well.
translation.ko: 와치니의 먹이를 낚아챌 뿐 아니라 새끼도 해칠 수 있죠

translation.en: If they don't feed soon,
they will die regardless.
It's a meager snack, but after two days without food,
translation.ko: 빈약한 간식일 따름이지만 이틀이나 먹지 못한 상태이니

translation.en: it's a lifesaver.
But more than 10% of cheetah kills are stolen.
translation.ko: 하지만 치타가 사냥한 동물은 10% 이상 도둑맞습니다

translation.en: Wa Chini must defend every scrap of energy she captures…
translation.ko: 와치니는 자기가 포획한 에너지를 하나도 남김없이 지켜야 합니다

translation.en: …because when energy is scarce,
competition is fierce.
Wa Chini's struggle to survive and sustain her family is repeated
translation.ko: 생존해 가족을 부양하기 위한 와치니의 분투는 되풀이됩니다

translation.en: day after day…
…month after month.
Every meal is a fight.
In the battle between using and acquiring energy…
translation.ko: 에너지 사용과 획득 간에 벌어지는 전투에서…

translation.en: Wa Chini is only just breaking even.
Dry season on the Serengeti is defined by constant hunger.
But change is in the air.
translation.ko: 하지만 공기 중에 변화의 기운이 돕니다

translation.en: The sun's heat has pulled what moisture there is high into the sky.
translation.ko: 태양의 열기가 지상의 수분을 하늘 높이 끌어당겼습니다

translation.en: And what goes up
must eventually come down.
Rains sweep across the plains
and bring dry season to an end.
As the clouds clear,
a glimmer of hope appears.
A single blade of grass cannot feed Wa Chini's family…
translation.ko: 이파리 하나로는 와치니 가족을 먹일 수 없지만…

translation.en: but deep within its cells lies the answer to their hunger.
translation.ko: 그 세포 깊숙이에 굶주림에 대한 답이 있습니다

translation.en: Here, there's a hidden world.
Microscopic stacks called grana bask in the warm rays from the sun.
translation.ko: '그라나'라는 미세 물질 더미가 태양의 따뜻한 광선을 쪼입니다

translation.en: Their surface is covered with a forest of tiny, light-harvesting proteins
translation.ko: 그라나의 표면은 빛을 채집하는 작은 단백질로 빽빽합니다

translation.en: that capture energy from our nearest star.
translation.ko: 이것이 가장 가까운 별에서 온 에너지를 포착합니다

translation.en: They're packed with the green pigment chlorophyll,
which absorbs rays of light.
Through the magic of photosynthesis…
water combines with carbon dioxide…
and sunbeams are spun into sugar.
In a matter of days, the once parched plains are painted green.
translation.ko: 메말랐던 평원이 며칠 만에 녹색으로 물들었습니다

translation.en: Billions of blades of grass now soak up the boundless sunlight.
translation.ko: 풀잎 수십억 개가 한없는 햇빛을 빨아들입니다

translation.en: And the universe's energy becomes embedded in the landscape.
translation.ko: 그렇게 우주의 에너지가 풍경에 쏙쏙 파고듭니다

translation.en: There's only one problem.
Cheetahs can't eat grass.
But far away in the northern woodlands,
there are beasts… that do.
Hundreds of thousands of them.
Wildebeest.
They have wide mouths, flexible lips, and four stomachs
translation.ko: 누는 입이 넓고 입술이 유연하며 위는 네 개를 가졌습니다

translation.en: that are perfectly adapted to eating grass.
translation.ko: 풀을 먹는 데 완벽하게 적응된 것입니다

translation.en: The massive herds are constantly on the move
in search of fresh grazing.
To find the grass, they follow the rain.
translation.ko: 이 녀석들은 풀을 찾으려고 비를 따라가죠

translation.en: Driven, like all of us…
by hunger.
But if there is one rule in the Serengeti,
it's that food never comes easy.
translation.ko: 먹을 것은 쉽게 얻어지지 않는다는 것입니다

translation.en: The Mara River…
home to some of the largest crocodiles on Earth.
translation.ko: 지구에서 손꼽을 만큼 큰 악어들이 사는 곳이죠

translation.en: It's a serious roadblock
in the wildebeests' quest for vital energy.
To the south, Wa Chini spends every available moment
translation.ko: 남쪽으로는 와치니가 먹을 만한 것을 찾아

translation.en: scouring the plains for something edible.
translation.ko: 한 시도 쉬지 않고 평원을 샅샅이 뒤집니다

translation.en: After six months surviving on a meager diet,
one of her cubs has managed to grow bigger…
translation.ko: 새끼 중 한 마리는 그럭저럭 몸집을 키웠습니다

translation.en: …and is even learning some hunting skills of her own.
But the other cub is nowhere to be seen.
translation.ko: 하지만 다른 새끼는 어디에도 보이지 않습니다

translation.en: Just five percent of cheetah cubs make it into adulthood.
Most lose their lives to hungry lions and hyenas.
translation.ko: 굶주린 사자와 하이에나에게 대부분 목숨을 잃죠

translation.en: This cub's future is far from guaranteed…
translation.ko: 이 새끼의 미래도 보장된 것과는 거리가 멉니다

translation.en: even when energy is tantalizingly close.
translation.ko: 감질날 정도로 가까운 곳에 에너지가 있더라도요

translation.en: Amassed on the banks of the Mara,
the wildebeest have nowhere to go but forward.
translation.ko: 누 떼입니다 앞으로 나아가는 수밖에 도리가 없죠

translation.en: But someone needs to be first.
translation.ko: 하지만 먼저 나서는 녀석이 있어야 합니다

translation.en: One and a half million wildebeest
make this journey each year.
And here, the battle between using and consuming energy…
translation.ko: 그리고 이곳에서는 에너지 사용과 섭취 간의 전투가…

translation.en: plays out on an epic scale.
For those lucky enough to make it across,
this is only the beginning.
Now, they must travel hundreds of kilometers
day and night
for over two months…
to get to the grassy plains.
Wa Chini eagerly awaits the arrival of the wildebeest,
translation.ko: 와치니는 누 떼의 도착을 간절하게 기다리지만

translation.en: but there is another migration taking place that is critical
translation.ko: 또 다른 이주도 일어나고 있는데 이는 두 동물의 생존에 대단히 중요한 것입니다

translation.en: to the survival of both animals.
translation.ko: 이는 두 동물의 생존에 대단히 중요한 것입니다

translation.en: It's the journey of unfathomable distance and time.
translation.ko: 헤아릴 수 없는 거리와 시간의 여정이죠

translation.en: And without it, every creature on the Serengeti would go hungry.
translation.ko: 그 이주가 없으면 세렝게티의 모든 생명체는 굶주리게 될 겁니다

translation.en: In the core of our sun,
as atoms collide and fuse,
photons are released and stream outwards.
These tiny packages of light energy have zero mass
translation.ko: 이 자그마한 빛 에너지 꾸러미는 질량이 0이고

translation.en: and travel at the speed of light.
But inside the unbelievably dense core,
translation.ko: 하지만 믿기지 않을 만큼 조밀한 핵 안에서

translation.en: they're restrained, absorbed, scattered.
A trip that would normally take just two seconds can take a million years.
translation.ko: 보통 2초면 충분할 여행은 100만 년까지 걸리기도 합니다

translation.en: It's a mind-boggling torturous struggle to escape the sun.
translation.ko: 이것은 태양에서 탈출하려는 엄청나게 고통스러운 몸부림입니다

translation.en: But slowly, the photons do rise
upward through the sun's layers
toward its raging hot surface…
where they can finally be set free.
They radiate out in all directions…
as starlight…
traveling 150 million kilometers in just over eight minutes.
Arriving just in time…
to meet the wildebeest at the end of their journey.
translation.ko: 여정의 끝에 다다른 누 떼를 만나는군요

translation.en: Each individual blade of grass absorbs ten quadrillion photons every second…
capturing enough energy overall to feed these massive herds.
translation.ko: 이 대규모 누 떼를 다 먹일 만한 에너지를 포착해 냅니다

translation.en: From star…
…to grass…
to wildebeest…
sunlight now provides them with power to move…
to grow…
to reproduce.
And the longer they're out on the plains eating,
the longer they're available to be eaten.
Rich, delicious, plentiful energy
is finally within striking distance.
But with three million eyes watching…
Wa Chini needs to move fast.
Luckily, she's a cheetah.
At last, Wa Chini gets a taste of starlight.
With every bite,
proteins and fats imbued with cosmic energy
translation.ko: 우주 에너지가 꽉 채워진 단백질과 지방이

translation.en: enter Wa Chini's bloodstream.
Their final destination are her body's cellular power plants,
translation.ko: 이것들의 최종 목적지는 와치니의 몸속 세포 발전소입니다

translation.en: mitochondria…
where one last transformation will take place.
Within each mitochondrion is a surging landscape.
translation.ko: 각각의 미토콘드리아 안쪽 풍경은 용솟음치는 듯합니다

translation.en: Canyons of membranes rippling with complex chemistry.
translation.ko: 복잡한 화학 작용이 퍼지는 세포막으로 이뤄진 협곡이죠

translation.en: It's here that the energy-rich food reacts with oxygen
translation.ko: 에너지가 풍부한 음식이 이곳에서 산소와 반응하고

translation.en: and is finally broken down…
releasing our universe's energy directly into Wa Chini's cells…
translation.ko: 우리 우주의 에너지를 곧장 와치니의 세포에 풀어놓습니다

translation.en: …powering every action and thought,
translation.ko: 모든 행동과 사고에 동력을 공급하는 것입니다

translation.en: every little movement.
The journey from star to cell is complete.
Energy that once lit up the universe
now gives Wa Chini and her cub the gift of life.
In green season,
hunger is just a memory.
Across the Serengeti, energy is continually transformed…
translation.ko: 세렝게티 전역에서 에너지는 지속적으로 형태를 바꿉니다

translation.en: passing from one life to another,
nourishing the entire ecosystem.
Our sun is the ultimate provider.
Everything feeds on starlight.
The trouble is, there's nothing to feed the sun.
translation.ko: 문제는 태양을 먹여 살릴 게 없다는 것입니다

translation.en: And in five billion years,
it will run out of fuel.
As its core collapses,
the sun will expand…
and become a red giant…
that will devour the inner planets, Mercury and Venus.
As it balloons out toward Earth,
the extreme gravity will rip our moon to shreds…
translation.ko: 극도로 강한 중력 탓에 달이 산산조각 날 것입니다

translation.en: …leaving a ring of moon rock around Earth.
translation.ko: 지구 주위에 월석으로 된 고리를 남기겠지요

translation.en: The ultimate fate of our planet is unknown.
translation.ko: 우리 행성의 최후 운명은 알려진 바 없습니다

translation.en: But there will be one last sunrise…
translation.ko: 하지만 언젠가는 마지막 태양이 뜰 것이고…

translation.en: before our star's outer layers blow away,
translation.ko: 그 후 우리 별의 바깥층이 폭발할 것이며

translation.en: and it takes its final breath.
translation.ko: 우리 별은 마지막 들숨을 마실 것입니다

translation.en: All that will remain is a dying ember,
a white dwarf,
barely the size of our Earth, surrounded by a vast glowing cloud.
translation.ko: 겨우 지구만 한 크기로 남아 거대하게 빛나는 구름에 둘러싸일 겁니다

translation.en: A beacon to the universe.
We were here.
But right now,
our star continues to shine down on us…
translation.ko: 우리 별은 우리를 계속해서 밝게 비춰줍니다

translation.en: …and will for billions of years to come,
translation.ko: 앞으로 수십억 년 동안 그럴 것이고요

translation.en: its energy a vital force for all life.
translation.ko: 그 에너지는 모든 생명체에 활력을 불어넣습니다

translation.en: Next in the story of our universe,
whether you are a blazing star…
a vast black hole,
or a chimpanzee learning the ropes,
everything needs time.
But what do you really know about this mysterious dimension?
translation.ko: 하지만 이 신비한 차원에 관해 정말로 아는 것이 뭘까요?

translation.en: Why does everything have a past, present, and future?
translation.ko: 왜 모든 것에는 과거, 현재, 미래가 있을까요?

translation.en: And would any of us be here…
without time?
